__TOC__

Ubuntu 12.04 Awareness Campaign is a project by MFauzirahman for Ubuntu Malaysia LoCo Team. The idea behind this project is to increase public awareness about Ubuntu brand and to let them have question in mind about 'What is Ubuntu?'. The shirt are announce on June 2012, MFauzirahman have designed Ubuntu 12.04 Precise Pangolin shirt. The reason to wear this t-shirt is to make it seen by people and let them ask question about ubuntu, getting information about where and how to get ubuntu.
